# The `DeadArgumentEliminationPass` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Eliminate dead arguments (and return values) from functions. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::DeadArgumentEliminationPass</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Eliminate dead arguments (and return values) from functions.

## Enumerations

### enum  {#a3dee2ca18ff5275c99041264099fd964}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="enum llvm::DeadArgumentEliminationPass::Liveness ">
During our initial pass over the program, we determine that things are either alive or maybe alive.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a3dee2ca18ff5275c99041264099fd964a8cb9173f3fd92152f18401c8bf8ba21b" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Live">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a3dee2ca18ff5275c99041264099fd964af29a24ceeaaae7277109ac9c7a52d958" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MaybeLive">

</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

We don&#39;t mark anything explicitly dead (even if we know they are), since anything not alive with no registered uses (in Uses) will never be marked alive and will thus become dead in the end.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-h/#l00073">73</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-h">DeadArgumentElimination.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### markIfNotLive() {#adf0f5b61fd3c855d9628922a79216b3e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DeadArgumentEliminationPass::Liveness DeadArgumentEliminationPass::markIfNotLive (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/retorarg">RetOrArg</a> Use, <a href="#a0fc4b7b5727b4a936d7c1c23320a8b12">UseVector</a> &amp; MaybeLiveUses)</>}>
Checks <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> for liveness in LiveValues.

If <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> is not live, it adds <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> to the MaybeLiveUses argument. Returns the determined liveness of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-h/#l00124">124</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-h">DeadArgumentElimination.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-cpp/#l00367">367</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-cpp">DeadArgumentElimination.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### markLive() {#ac585884e30c28f7046c2b046fb8b5c06}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void DeadArgumentEliminationPass::markLive (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/retorarg">RetOrArg</a> &amp; RA)</>}>
Mark the given return value or argument as live.

Additionally, mark any values that are used by this value (according to Uses) live as well.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-h/#l00133">133</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-h">DeadArgumentElimination.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-cpp/#l00701">701</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-cpp">DeadArgumentElimination.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### markLive() {#ab2e08655e55ad2ff50fcb32d12912868}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void DeadArgumentEliminationPass::markLive (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F)</>}>
Mark the given <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> as alive, meaning that it cannot be changed in any way.

Additionally, mark any values that are used as this function&#39;s parameters or by its return values (according to Uses) live as well.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-h/#l00134">134</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-h">DeadArgumentElimination.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-cpp/#l00686">686</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-cpp">DeadArgumentElimination.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### markValue() {#a32ffe897f911cd4fcff899217c1731c0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void DeadArgumentEliminationPass::markValue (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/retorarg">RetOrArg</a> &amp; RA, <a href="#a3dee2ca18ff5275c99041264099fd964">Liveness</a> L, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="#a0fc4b7b5727b4a936d7c1c23320a8b12">UseVector</a> &amp; MaybeLiveUses)</>}>
Marks the liveness of RA depending on L.

If L is MaybeLive, it also takes all uses in MaybeLiveUses and records them in Uses, such that RA will be marked live if any use in MaybeLiveUses gets marked live later on.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-h/#l00131">131</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-h">DeadArgumentElimination.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-cpp/#l00661">661</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-cpp">DeadArgumentElimination.cpp</a>.

### surveyFunction() {#a1da52400f8fb3077bc591f79149890c7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void DeadArgumentEliminationPass::surveyFunction (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F)</>}>
Performs the initial survey of the specified function, checking out whether it uses any of its incoming arguments or whether any callers use the return value.

This fills in the LiveValues set and Uses map.

We consider arguments of non-internal functions to be intrinsically alive as well as arguments to functions which have their &quot;address taken&quot;.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-h/#l00129">129</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-h">DeadArgumentElimination.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-cpp/#l00494">494</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-cpp">DeadArgumentElimination.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### surveyUse() {#a9b24eade63288a140f8e867dd018ad88}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DeadArgumentEliminationPass::Liveness DeadArgumentEliminationPass::surveyUse (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> &#42; U, <a href="#a0fc4b7b5727b4a936d7c1c23320a8b12">UseVector</a> &amp; MaybeLiveUses, unsigned RetValNum=-1U)</>}>
Looks at a single use of an argument or return value and determines if it should be alive or not.

Adds this use to MaybeLiveUses if it causes the used value to become MaybeLive.

RetValNum is the return value number to use when this use is used in a return instruction. This is used in the recursion, you should always leave it at 0.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-h/#l00125">125</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-h">DeadArgumentElimination.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-cpp/#l00387">387</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-cpp">DeadArgumentElimination.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### surveyUses() {#a61f8aeca066956a480df0f6960832b2e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DeadArgumentEliminationPass::Liveness DeadArgumentEliminationPass::surveyUses (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; V, <a href="#a0fc4b7b5727b4a936d7c1c23320a8b12">UseVector</a> &amp; MaybeLiveUses)</>}>
Looks at all the uses of the given value Returns the <a href="#a3dee2ca18ff5275c99041264099fd964">Liveness</a> deduced from the uses of this value.

Adds all uses that cause the result to be MaybeLive to MaybeLiveRetUses. If the result is Live, MaybeLiveUses might be modified but its content should be ignored (since it might not be complete).

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-h/#l00127">127</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-h">DeadArgumentElimination.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-cpp/#l00475">475</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-cpp">DeadArgumentElimination.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</MemberDefinition>

### Uses {#afb15aeeba5e11ad17b03524730d51b7d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="UseMap llvm::DeadArgumentEliminationPass::Uses">
This maps a return value or argument to any MaybeLive return values or arguments it uses.

This allows the MaybeLive values to be marked live when any of its users is marked live. For example (indices are left out for clarity):
<ul>
<li>Uses&#91;ret F&#93; = ret G This means that F calls G, and F returns the value returned by G.</li>
<li>Uses&#91;arg F&#93; = ret G This means that some function calls G and passes its result as an argument to F.</li>
<li>Uses&#91;ret F&#93; = arg F This means that F returns one of its own arguments.</li>
<li>Uses&#91;arg F&#93; = arg G This means that G calls F and passes one of its own (G&#39;s) arguments directly to F.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-h/#l00106">106</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-h">DeadArgumentElimination.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
